items.content_html: a simple, lightweight class-based package for making RESTful API requests in JavaScript projects. It provides an easy-to-use interface for sending HTTP requests to an API using JSON. Aimed to have minimum config setup (virtually no required params) and yet powerful.
items.title: vasili-ordina/api-handler: a simple, lightweight class-based package for making RESTful API requests in JavaScript projects. It provides an easy-to-use interface for sending HTTP requests to an API using JSON. Aimed to have minimum config setup (virtually no required params) and yet powerful.
